name: VIPTALON
tag_list: deals, discount, offline-store, shopping, fashion, private-club
overview:
VIPTALON (www.viptalon.ru) is an online Russian shopping club that features a daily deal on fashionable clothes and accessories. VIPTALON organizes special sale prices for fashion collections in our partners’ offline stores. Discounts can be as high as 75% off store prices, and can be combined with current store discounts. Membership is by invitation only. Members of the club are able to purchase access to these sale prices by filling out a request form on the website.

The site embodies the best qualities of internet-outlets and collective buying services. Unlike online shopping, our club members have benefits. They have access to new fashion collections, rich assortments of goods and full size range of a store. Customers can evaluate the quality of things; they can try them on and buy them with a discount by presenting a VIP-talon at cash desk. Moreover, there is no need to wait for delivery, or go through the complicated process of returning an item if something does not suit you. Unlike services of collective buying, a planned sale is carried out regardless of how many people want to take part in it.

Terms of a deal do not exceed a week.
